lines.transliteration_english: raahi zikaram b aalamae binumaa

Shabad OS N.translation: You should show the meditation (of my Naam) to the entire world,

lines.gurmukhi: b-hmw So iz vsi& mn goXw ]26]
lines.transliteration_english: ba-hamaa sho z vasaf man goyaa | 26 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And, make every one chaste and sacred through My (Akaalpurakh's) kudos. (26)

lines.gurmukhi: dr hmw jw pnwho Xwir qU Am
lines.transliteration_english: dhar hamaa jaa panaaho yaar thoo ama

Shabad OS N.translation: I am your friend and well wisher at all places and in all situations, and I am your refuge;

lines.gurmukhi: XwvrI b^So ^wsqgwir qU Am ]27]
lines.transliteration_english: yaavaree bakhasho khaasathagaar thoo am | 27 |

Shabad OS N.translation: I am there to support you, and I am your avid fan. (27)

lines.gurmukhi: hr ik nwim qU brqrIN dwnd
lines.transliteration_english: har k naam thoo baratharee dhaanadha

Shabad OS N.translation: Anyone who would try to elevate your name and make you famous,

lines.gurmukhi: Az idlo jW b-vsi& mn ^wnd ]28]
lines.transliteration_english: az dhilo jaa(n) ba-vasaf man khaanadh | 28 |

Shabad OS N.translation: He would, in fact, be approbating Me with his heart and soul. (28)

lines.gurmukhi: mn aU rw zwiq ^ud numwiem bwz
lines.transliteration_english: man oo raa zaath khudh numaaeim baaza

Shabad OS N.translation: Then, kindly show me Your Limitless Entity,

lines.gurmukhi: AYhid mn s^qgIr br kun swz ]29]
lines.transliteration_english: aihadh man sakhathageer bar kun saaz | 29 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And, thus make my difficult resolves and situations eased up. (29)

lines.gurmukhi: igrid Awlm brAw vw hwdI SO
lines.transliteration_english: giradh aalam baraaa vaa haadhee shaaua

Shabad OS N.translation: You should come to this world and act like a guide and captain,

lines.gurmukhi: ik jhW ZYir mn inXrzd jO ]30]
lines.transliteration_english: k jehaa(n) ghair man niyarazadh jaau | 30 |

Shabad OS N.translation: Because this world is not worth even a grain of barley without Me, the Akaalpurakh. (30)

lines.gurmukhi: dr hkIkq mnm cU rwh-numw
lines.transliteration_english: dhar hakeekath manam choo raaha-numaa

Shabad OS N.translation: In reality, when I am your guide and steer,

lines.gurmukhi: qU jhW rw bpwie ^ud pYmw ]31]
lines.transliteration_english: thoo jehaa(n) raa bapaae khudh paimaa | 31 |

Shabad OS N.translation: Then, you should traverse the journey of this world with your own feet. (31)

lines.gurmukhi: hr ik rw ^whm v Svm hwdI
lines.transliteration_english: har k raa khaaham v shavam haadhee

Shabad OS N.translation: Whomsoever I like and I show him the direction in this world,

lines.gurmukhi: Az qU dr idl dr-AwrmS swdI ]32]
lines.transliteration_english: az thoo dhar dhil dhara-aaramash saadhee | 32 |

Shabad OS N.translation: Then, for his sake, I bring elation and happiness in his heart. (32)

lines.transliteration_english: vaa(n) k gumaraah saazamash z gazaba

Shabad OS N.translation: Whomsoever I will misdirect and put him on a wrong track out of My indignation for him,

lines.transliteration_english: nabharasadh az hadhaaeith thoo ba-rab | 33 |

Shabad OS N.translation: He will not be able to reach Me, the Akaalpurakh, in spite of your advice and counsel. (33)

lines.gurmukhi: Sudw gunrwh Awlmy bymn
lines.transliteration_english: shudhaa gunaraah aalamae baemana

Shabad OS N.translation: This world is being misdirected and strayed without me,

lines.gurmukhi: swihrW gSqw AMd jwdUie mn ]34]
lines.transliteration_english: saahiraa(n) gashathaa andh jaadhooe man | 34 |

Shabad OS N.translation: My sorcery has become the sorcerer himself. (34)

lines.gurmukhi: murdgW rw kunMd izMdw hmI
lines.transliteration_english: muradhagaa(n) raa kunandh zindhaa hamee

Shabad OS N.translation: My charms and spells bring the dead back alive,

lines.transliteration_english: zindhagaa(n) raa bajaa(n) kushandhaa hamee | 35 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And, those who are living (in sin) kill them. (35)

lines.gurmukhi: AwiqSy rw kunMd Awb vS
lines.transliteration_english: aathishae raa kunandh aab vasha

Shabad OS N.translation: My charms transform the 'fire' into ordinary water,

lines.gurmukhi: br sry Awb znMd AwiqS ]36]
lines.transliteration_english: bar sarae aab zanandh aathish | 36 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And, with the ordinary water, they extinguish and cool off the fires. (36)

lines.transliteration_english: har chih khaahandh mee-kunandh hamaa(n)

Shabad OS N.translation: My charms do whatever they like;

lines.gurmukhi: jumlw jwdU &n AMd br swmW ]37]
lines.transliteration_english: jumalaa jaadhoo fan andh bar saamaa(n) | 37 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And, they mystify with their spell all material and non-material things. (37)

lines.transliteration_english: raahi shaa(n) raa numaa ba-sooe mana

Shabad OS N.translation: Please divert their path in my direction,

lines.gurmukhi: ik pzIrMd gu&qgUie mn ]38]
lines.transliteration_english: k pazeerandh gufathagooe man | 38 |

Shabad OS N.translation: So that they can adopt and acquisition my words and message. (38)

Shabad OS N.translation: They do not go for any spells except My meditation,

Shabad OS N.translation: And, they do not move in any direction other than towards My door. (39)

lines.transliteration_english: k z dhozakh shavandh rusathaa hamae

Shabad OS N.translation: Because they have been spared of the Hades,

lines.gurmukhi: vrnw au&qMd dsq-bsqw hmy ]40]

Shabad OS N.translation: Otherwise, they would fall with their hands tied down. (40)

Shabad OS N.translation: This whole world, from one end to the other,

Shabad OS N.translation: Is relaying the message that this world is cruel and corrupt. (41)

Shabad OS N.translation: They do not realize any grief or happiness because of me,

lines.gurmukhi: hmw Az ZYir mn prySwnMd ]42]
lines.transliteration_english: hamaa az ghair man paraeshaanandh | 42 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And, without me, they all are confused and perplexed. (42)

lines.transliteration_english: aauajuman mee-kunandh v az anjama

Shabad OS N.translation: They congregate and from the stars

lines.gurmukhi: br SumwrMd rUiz SwdI E Zm ]43]

Shabad OS N.translation: They count the number of days of sorrow and happiness. (43)

lines.transliteration_english: bar nigaarandh nehiso saaaadh hamae

Shabad OS N.translation: Then they pen down their good and not-so-good fortunes in their horoscopes,

lines.gurmukhi: bwz goieMd kblo bwAd hmy ]44]
lines.transliteration_english: baaz goeindh kabalo baaadh hamae | 44 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And say, sometimes before and other times afterwards, as: (44)

lines.transliteration_english: neesath shaa(n) raa ba-zikar eisathikalaala

Shabad OS N.translation: They are not firm and consistent in their meditation chores,

lines.gurmukhi: kwl dwnMd jumlgW by-hwl ]45]
lines.transliteration_english: kaal dhaanandh jumalagaa(n) bae-haal | 45 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And, they talk and project themselves like confused and perplexed persons. (45)

Shabad OS N.translation: Divert their attention and face towards My meditation

lines.transliteration_english: k nadhaarandh dhosath juz zikaram | 46 |

Shabad OS N.translation: So that they will not consider anything other than discourses about Me as their friend. (46)

lines.transliteration_english: thaa hamaa kaar shaa(n) niko saazama

Shabad OS N.translation: So that I could set their worldly tasks on the right path,

lines.transliteration_english: khaathar shaa(n) z noor bitharaazam | 47 |

Shabad OS N.translation: And, I could improve and refine their inclinations and tendencies with the divine glow. (47)

lines.transliteration_english: man thuraa aafareedham az peae aa

Shabad OS N.translation: I have created you for this purpose

lines.gurmukhi: ik SvI rihnumw b-jumlw jhW ]48]
lines.transliteration_english: k shavee rehinumaa ba-jumalaa jehaa(n) | 48 |

Shabad OS N.translation: So that you should be the leader to steer the whole world towrads the right path. (48)
